item.description:
Let's mix things up and do a weeknight dinner at Ivy! We have been there once before and it is a really fun place. They do Italian style tapas (small plates) and have a great wine list, with most bottles only $26. Their website is http://www.ivyrestaur....

Ivy is located by Downtown Crossing, between the Downtown Crossing T stop and the Park Street T stop. Reservations are at 7:30. Call or email with any questions!

Corinne & Brad

Corinne: 617-780-1329
Brad: 617-780-1627
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations under Keuning. Sounds like our group will be upstairs.
item.name: Weeknight Dinner at Ivy Restaurant
